page.title: 16RYE HILL
page.content: Rye Hill is a new estate which consists of flats houses and miniature parks.The flats have slanted rooves which are pointed.The flats are built of brick but the rooves are made of wood which has been painted over.Some houses have gardens.Near the houses are mini parks, some are large and others small. In the smaller parks there are climbing frames and swings.In the bigger ones there is a slide, a roundabout and some swings.Some swings are made of car tyres.The slides are very bumpy and set in tarmac.The climbing frames are all different to each other. I like the estate because of its peace and quiet.
